latestInspection.result: Inspection Result Initial Annual Inspection - Passed inspection with no violations

infractions.Violation Summary: Camp operator fails to maintains staff records application qualifications certifications not on file or available for inspection employees education experience training and references not verified
Buddy system or other accountability system has not been established System does not contains camper identity ability record of coming and goings buddy assignments 15 minute checks
All camp staff have not had recent medical exam including TB testing as required by the Dept

violations.Violation Summary: Camp operated contrary to FDNY statement of compliance contrary to fire prevention regulations and applicable law
violations.Category: Violations requiring immediate correction Public Health Hazards

violations.Violation Summary: Camp Operator fails to developed and implemented Written Safety Plan Plan not reviewd and updated annually Plan not approved by DOHMH does not comply with health code and 7-25 of State Sanitary Code
violations.Category: Violations requiring correction within two weeks Critical Violations

violations.Violation Summary: Adequate insurance coverage was not obtained prior to camping season Does not includes workers compensation comprehensive liability and/or motor vehicle insurance
violations.Category: Violations requiring correction within two weeks Critical Violations
